content: I ripped out a few recipes for seafood dishes, including a grilled salmon recipe that caught my eye. I'm thinking of hosting a casual dinner party, probably around 6-8 guests. I'm open to suggestions for wine pairings, and I don't have any specific dietary restrictions in mind. By the way, I've been really into reading about food and cooking lately - I even attended a writing workshop last month where a journalist from The Atlantic spoke, and it inspired me to start reading the magazine more regularly.
